name: Prompt Options
description: Central prompt configuration widget with sliders, reference images, and generation settings. Syncs with photo and video generation widgets.
author: StickerNest

setSettings.description: Set multiple settings at once { guidanceScale, steps, width, height, etc. }

addReferenceImage.description: Add a reference image { url, strength }

setLora.description: Set LoRA configuration { url, scale, name }

loadPreset.description: Load a saved preset by name

promptChanged.description: Emitted when any prompt setting changes { prompt, negativePrompt, settings, referenceImages, lora }

generateRequested.description: Emitted when user clicks generate { type: 'image'|'video', config }

presetSaved.description: Emitted when a preset is saved { name, config }

referenceImageAdded.description: Emitted when reference image is added
